0.1.name: wordpress/diggstats
0.1.description:
Shows how your posts in doing at Digg on the Dashboard.

DiggStats shows how many Diggs your post has got at Digg.com.

Features

  • Shows how your posts in doing at Digg on the Dashboard.
  • Easy
  • Select the number of posts you want to show.

Usage

Activate and check the Dashboard!
